doc.field: Set of files on technical topics that relate to both Spadafora's firefighting exam book and his class on FIS 401, New Technology in the Fire Service (Fall 2011). Topics include: Plastics/ flame resistant technology, fire retardants, nuclear power plants, powdered aerosols (lots), fire dynamics simulation (lots), general firefighting history, disasters, on the job scenarios. Material includes papers (including student papers), tearsheets, print-outs, vendor product brochures (e.g. Stat-X fire suppression systems), CDs/DVDs (including a mailer from NIST with several disks re simulations, reports, etc.). Includes a packet of material from a Hospital Safety Conference at Mt. Sinai (2010) and approval of Spadafora's conflict of interest waiver request for writing the exam prep book. (Includes digital formats)
